reviews.text: This was GREAT. Wife and I didn't get our Hello Fresh order - they delivered our box to Someone Else :/ so this was our happy alternative. And soooo glad we...

Their lunch buffet was a good experience...

The thing I like best about Cumin and Curry is that the lunch buffet gets you a chance to try different things....
I have been on an Indian food kick for the last 2 years. I tried C&C and loved it. I also wanted to try other Indian restaurants to see how they compare....
